column1: Douw Aturure Airport (Indonesian: Bandar Udara  Douw Aturure) (IATA: NBX
column2: ICAO: WABI) is an airport in Nabire
column5: Indonesia. The Douw Aturure Airport is small airport located right in the small of the town
column6: with the city center just a few hundred meters away.

column2: a building in the airport caught on fire with no casualties
column3: though the operations of the airport following the fire was unaffected.
